      static Location intersection(Location r1, Location r1b, Location r2, Location r2b)
      Calculates the point of intersection between a line that goes through r1 and r1b, and one that goes through r2 and r2b The algorithm doesn't require that the lines actually intersect, if not it will return the point where the lines are closest to each other.

      • intersection

        public static Location intersection(Location r1,
                                    Location r1b,
                                    Location r2,
                                    Location r2b)
        Calculates the point of intersection between a line that goes through r1 and r1b, and one that goes through r2 and r2b The algorithm doesn't require that the lines actually intersect, if not it will return the point where the lines are closest to each other.
        Returns:
        null if the lines are parallel
